Drive More, Pay Less

WaiveWork provides affordable cars for people with driving centered careers.

Get Started Now

Why WaiveWork?

Opportunities to make money driving are increasing. The problem? So are the costs of car ownership. Our solution is WaiveWork: the world’s first car rental service funded by advertising!

Is WaiveWork For Me?

Whether you don’t have a car, or are simply searching for a more cost efficient work vehicle - WaiveWork is for you.

Want to save money?
Can’t afford to buy car?
Driving centered career?
Car gets bad mileage?
High car maintenance?

How it works

Apply

Apply to become a WaiveWork driver. After your interview and orientation, the keys are yours!

Drive

Drive the car around to earn WaivePoints. Once you hit your weekly quota, your rental will automatically renew.

Return

When your rental contract is over, you can start a new one or return the car. It’s up to you!

Pricing

All you have to pay for is Insurance and Gas. Good thing we use hybrids huh?

Driver Sign Up

If accepted, we’ll reach out and set up a time for your interview and orientation.

Get Started Now

Got Questions?

Feel free to reach out to us and we'll be happy to answer any questions you may have.
